entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing before morning. Fog patches developing before morning. Temperature steady near minus 14. Forecast issued 8:08 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High minus 11. Forecast issued 8:08 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 8:08 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023
